attributes.action: Bring the speed limit down on slag lane lowton after horse killed
attributes.additional_details: 5 of our horses escaped from our fields and got on to slag lane, 3 of our horses have been injured and our 3 year old miniature cob has been Pts due to a broken femur due to being hit by a car, it's very sad and painful for such a young horse to loose it's life tonight, a loved family member and a little girls pony, hopefully from this accident tonight it will prompt drivers to be more aware driving along slag lane and Slow down, as the lane is full of stables and farms, Just so unfair how a young horse has needed to die due to this.  Police are investigating the crash involving our cob and the car and will be getting back to us soon. But thank you so much for everyone helping out tonight
